Description.Name: USI MT3620 BT COMBO
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This header lists the available peripherals for the USI MT3620 BT COMBO
// and provides the header definition and application manifest values required to use them.

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_NRF52_RESET
Peripherals.Comment: The internal connection to the BT_nRST signal on nRF52810 from MT3620 GPIO 22. USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO U1B pin 37 also exposes this signal.

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_NRF52_DFU
Peripherals.Comment: The internal connection to the BT_FW_EN signal on nRF52810 from MT3620 GPIO 23. USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO U1B pin 38 also exposes this signal.

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_PIN1_GPIO56
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 1 exposes GPIO 56.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 2 exposes GPIO 59.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 3 exposes GPIO 57.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 33 exposes GPIO 40.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 34 exposes GPIO 39. Pin shared with SPI2 and UART2.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 45 exposes GPIO 28. Pin shared with ISU0.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 46 exposes GPIO 27. Pin shared with ISU0.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 47 exposes GPIO 26. Pin shared with SPI0 and UART0.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 66 exposes GPIO 3.

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_PIN67_GPIO2
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 67 exposes GPIO 2.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 88 exposes GPIO 70. Pin shared with SPI3.

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_PIN89_GPIO68
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 89 exposes GPIO 68. Pin shared with ISU3.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 90 exposes GPIO 67. Pin shared with ISU3.

Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO pin 91 exposes GPIO 66. Pin shared with SPI3 and UART3.

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU0_UART
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 0 configured as UART, pin 45 (RX), pin 47 (TX), pin 44 (CTS), and pin 46 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU0_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 0 configured as SPI, pin 45 (MISO), pin 47 (SCLK), pin 43 (CSB), pin 44 (CSA), and pin 46 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU0_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 0 configured as I2C,  pin 45 (SDA) and pin 46 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU1_UART
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 1 configured as UART, pin 40 (RX), pin 42 (TX), pin 39 (CTS), and pin 41 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU1_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 1 configured as SPI, pin 40 (MISO), pin 42 (SCLK), pin 39 (CSA), pin 41 (MOSI) and pin 38 (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU1_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 1 configured as I2C,  pin 40 (SDA) and pin 41 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU2_UART
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 2 configured as UART, pin 35 (RX), pin 37 (TX), pin 34 (CTS), pin 36 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU2_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 2 configured as SPI, pin 35 (MISO), pin 37 (SCLK), pin 34 (CSA), pin 36 (MOSI) and pin 33 (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU2_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 2 configured as I2C,  pin 35 (SDA) and pin 36 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU3_UART
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 3 configured as UART, pin 89 (RX), pin 91 (TX), pin 87 (CTS), pin 90 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 3 configured as SPI, pin 89 (MISO), pin 91 (SCLK), pin 87 (CSA), pin 90 (MOSI) and pin 88 (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_ISU3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 3 configured as I2C,  pin 89 (SDA) and pin 90 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: USI_MT3620_BT_COMBO_NRF52_UART
Peripherals.Comment: The serial connection to nRF52810 from MT3620. USI-MT3620-BT-COMBO ISU 4 configured as UART, pin 122 (RX), pin 119 (TX), pin 123 (CTS), pin 120 (RTS).
